営業手法: (えいぎょうしゅほう) - business model
営業損失: (えいぎょうそんしつ) - operating loss
営業時間: (えいぎょうじかん) - business hours; opening hours; office hours
営業案内: (えいぎょうあんない) - business guide; catalogue; document describing one's business
営業活動: (えいぎょうかつどう) - business activities
営業畑: (えいぎょうばたけ) - sales field
営業秘密: (えいぎょうひみつ) - trade secret
営業種目: (えいぎょうしゅもく) - business items; description of business; line of business
営業経費: (えいぎょうけいひ) - operation cost
営業許可書: (えいぎょうきょかしょ) - business permit
営業許可申請書: (えいぎょうきょかしんせいしょ) - application form for business permit; business permit application form
営業譲渡: (えいぎょうじょうと) - transfer of business; business transfer
営業譲渡契約書: (えいぎょうじょうとけいやくしょ) - business transfer agreement
営業費: (えいぎょうひ) - operating expenses; operating cost
営業路線: (えいぎょうろせん) - (yoji) railroad (bus) lines (routes) in operation; business plan (policy)
嗄びる: (からびる) - to dry up; to shrivel
嗄らす: (からす) - to talk (or shout) oneself hoarse
嗄れ声: (かれごえ) - hoarse voice; husky voice
嗅ぎつける: (かぎつける) - to sniff out; to get wind of
嗅ぎ付ける: (かぎつける) - to sniff out; to get wind of
嗅ぎ出す: (かぎだす) - to scent out; to detect
嗅ぎ分ける: (かぎわける) - to scent out; to discern
嗅ぎ取る: (かぎとる) - to smell; to sense
嗅ぎ回る: (かぎまわる) - to sniff around; to snoop around/to nose about
嗅ぎ当てる: (かぎあてる) - to sniff out; to catch the scent of
嗅球: (きゅうきゅう) - olfactory bulb; bulbus olfactorius
嗅覚受容神経: (きゅうかくじゅようしんけい) - olfactory receptor neuron
嗚呼: (アー) - (also written as 於乎, 於戯, 嗟乎, 嗟夫, 吁, etc.) Ah!/Oh!/Alas!; Yes/Indeed/That is correct; Hey!/Yo!; Uh huh/Yeah yeah/Right/Gotcha
嗜み: (たしなみ) - taste (in goods, etc.); manners/etiquette; modesty/restraint/prudence; knowledge, experience (of the arts, etc.)/accomplishments; taking care of one's personal appearance
嗜む: (たしなむ) - to have a taste for/to be fond of/to have an interest in (e.g. a hobby); to be modest/to be prudent
嗜好品: (しこうひん) - luxury grocery item (e.g. alcohol, coffee, tea, tobacco); indulgence; something consumed for taste or stimulant effect rather than nourishment
嗜眠性脳炎: (しみんせいのうえん) - encephalitis lethargica
嗣ぐ: (つぐ) - to succeed (someone in a business or inheritance)
嗣業: (しぎょう) - succeeding to a business
嗤い: (わらい) - laugh/laughter; smile; (esp. 嗤い)  sneer; sex aids (e.g. dildos, pornographic books, erotic woodblock prints, etc.)
嗤う: (わらう) - to laugh; to smile; (esp. 嗤う) to sneer/to ridicule; (as 笑ってしまう or 笑っちゃう) to be dumbfounded/to be flabbergasted
嗽ぐ: (くちすすぐ) - to gargle; to rinse the mouth
嗾ける: (けしかける) - to instigate; to incite; to spur on; to set (e.g. a dog after someone)
嘆かわしい: (なげかわしい) - sad; wretched; deplorable
嘆かわしい事態: (なげかわしいじたい) - deplorable situation
嘆き悲しむ: (なげきかなしむ) - to grieve and moan
嘆ずる: (たんずる) - to grieve; to lament; to sigh in admiration
嘆声: (たんせい) - sigh (of admiration or lamentation)
嘆息: (たんそく) - sigh; grief; lamentation; deploring
嘈囃: (そうざつ) - (嘈囃 is sometimes read むねやけ)  heartburn; sour stomach
嘉する: (よみする) - to praise; to extol; to applaud; to esteem
嘉慶: (かけい) - Kakei era (of the Northern Court) (1387.8.23-1389.2.9)
